trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供的基底類別<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The CodeDomSerializerBase class is used as a shared base between the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer> classes.
trans-unit.target: CodeDomSerializerBase 類別做為共用基底之間<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer>類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> classes derive from the CodeDomSerializerBase class.
trans-unit.target: 公用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>類別衍生自 CodeDomSerializerBase 類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Each public class defines its own public API.
trans-unit.target: 每個公用類別定義自己的公用 API。

trans-unit.source: The CodeDomSerializerBase class defines no public API, but does offer a multitude of utility methods that can be used to aid the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: CodeDomSerializerBase 類別定義任何公用 API，但是也提供許多公用程式方法，可用來協助序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the given expression into an in-memory object.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化指定的記憶體中物件的運算式。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper method that derived classes can call to deserialize an expression.
trans-unit.target: 這是 helper 方法，衍生類別可以還原序列化運算式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It deserializes the statement by interpreting and executing the CodeDOM expression specified by the `expression` parameter, and then returns the results.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化解譯及執行所指定的 CodeDOM 運算式陳述式`expression`參數，然後傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: If an object needs to be created as a result of this expression, it will be given the name specified by the `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件必須先建立這個運算式的結果，會授與它所指定的名稱`name`參數。

trans-unit.source: The name can be `null` if there is no need to name the object.
trans-unit.target: 名稱可以是`null`如果不需要命名的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how specific expressions are handled.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何指定運算式的處理。

trans-unit.source: |Expression|Behavior| |----------------|--------------| |<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThisReferenceExpression>|This expression represents `this` or `Me`.
trans-unit.target: |運算式 |行為 | |----------------|--------------| |<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThisReferenceExpression>|這個運算式表示`this`或`Me`。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThisReferenceExpression>

trans-unit.source: To locate the object that is associated with this expression, the DeserializeExpression method will look in the context stack for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>.
trans-unit.target: 若要找出與這個運算式相關聯的物件，DeserializeExpression 方法會查詢<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>內容堆疊

trans-unit.source: This object contains the root object of the graph and the expression that represents it.
trans-unit.target: 此物件包含圖形和運算式，表示它的根物件。

trans-unit.source: If the object is present and the expression matches, the root object will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件存在，並且運算式比對，就會傳回根物件。

trans-unit.source: An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.| |<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression>|If the target of the field reference evaluates to the root object, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A> method of the manager parameter will be used to retrieve the object instance based on name.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到執行個體，則會報告錯誤。 | |<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression>|如果欄位參考的目標評估為根物件，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A>的管理員參數的方法將會用來擷取以名稱為基礎的物件執行個體。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, standard reflection is used against the target object to locate the requested field.
trans-unit.target: 否則，一般使用反映對目標物件找不到要求的欄位。

trans-unit.source: An error is reported if the field cannot be located.| |<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableReferenceExpression>|The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A> method of the `manager` parameter is used to locate the instance representing the given variable name.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到欄位，會報告錯誤。 | |<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableReferenceExpression>|<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A>方法`manager`參數用來找出此執行個體表示指定的變數名稱。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableReferenceExpression>

trans-unit.source: An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.| DeserializeExpression continues to interpret expressions until they are completely resolved to an object, or until it can no longer simplify the expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到執行個體，則會報告錯誤。 | DeserializeExpression 會繼續解譯運算式，直到它們完全解析至物件，或直到它不再可以簡化的運算式。

trans-unit.source: In this case, DeserializeExpression will return a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> that contains the most simplified expression.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，將會傳回 DeserializeExpression <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>，其中包含最簡化的運算式。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>

trans-unit.source: The following expressions are not supported: - <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression> - <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression> - <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateCreateExpression>
trans-unit.target: 不支援下列運算式:- <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression>- <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression>- <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateCreateExpression></xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateCreateExpression> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object that results from the expression.
trans-unit.target: 運算式產生的物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no need to name the object.
trans-unit.target: 可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不需要命名的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> to interpret.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>來解譯。

trans-unit.source: An object resulting from interpretation of expression.
trans-unit.target: 物件所產生的解譯 expression 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the given type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The DeserializeInstance method is invoked during deserialization to obtain an instance of an object.
trans-unit.target: DeserializeInstance 方法會取得物件的執行個體還原序列化期間叫用。

trans-unit.source: When this is called, an instance of the requested type should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫時，應該會傳回所要求類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A> method of the `manager` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會叫用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A>方法`manager`參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the instance to return.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要傳回之執行個體。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The parameters to pass to the constructor for `type`.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給建構函式的參數`type`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the deserialized object.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化的物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add this object to the design container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要將此物件加入設計容器，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object must implement <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> for this to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 物件必須實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> ，才能發生效用。

trans-unit.source: An instance of type.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體 type 。

trans-unit.source: manager or type is .
trans-unit.target: manageror type is .

trans-unit.source: Deserializes properties on the given object from the invariant culture’s resource bundle.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化而異的文化特性的資源配套從指定的物件上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The DeserializePropertiesFromResources method is a helper method that derived classes can call.
trans-unit.target: DeserializePropertiesFromResources 方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It looks for properties on the given object and attempts to load their values out of the invariant culture’s resource bundle.
trans-unit.target: 它會尋找指定的物件上的屬性，並嘗試載入它們的值，不因文化特性而異的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: This is generally used to handle design-time properties that are not emitted into source code.
trans-unit.target: 這通常用來處理不會發出至原始碼的設計階段屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not be used for localized properties because it only operates on the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 它應該不會用於當地語系化屬性因為它只作用於文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: This method inspects all of the properties of the `value` parameter that match the attributes specified by the `filter` parameter, and then checks for those properties in a resource binary object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查所有的屬性`value`參數符合指定的屬性`filter`參數，然後檢查這些資源的二進位物件中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for deserializing properties that cannot be represented in code, such as design-time properties.
trans-unit.target: 這可用於無法在程式碼，例如設計階段屬性中的還原序列化屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method requires that a designer loader offers an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> to read resources.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要設計工具載入器提供<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>讀取資源。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> provides a <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader> for the invariant culture, then DeserializePropertiesFromResources will read resources from the XML resource (.resx) file’s metadata section, which is not included in final compiled code.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>提供<xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader>而異的文化特性，然後 DeserializePropertiesFromResources 將資源從讀取 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔案的中繼資料區段不會包含在最終編譯的程式碼。</xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>

trans-unit.source: If this service is not available, no resources will be read.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服務無法使用，將會不讀取任何資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The object from which the properties are to be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 從中的屬性是要還原序列化物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Attribute> array that filters which properties will be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Attribute>陣列，可篩選的屬性將進行還原序列化。</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: Deserializes a statement by interpreting and executing a CodeDOM statement.
trans-unit.target: 解譯及執行 CodeDOM 陳述式，還原序列化的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The DeserializeStatement method is a helper method that derived classes can call.
trans-unit.target: DeserializeStatement 方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It interprets the `statement` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它可解譯`statement`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement> being deserialized will be pushed on the context stack.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement>在還原序列化會推入內容堆疊。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref>還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: Returns an expression for the given object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之物件的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The GetExpression method returns an expression representing the given object.
trans-unit.target: GetExpression 方法會傳回代表指定之物件的運算式。

trans-unit.source: It can return `null`, indicating that no expression has been set that describes the object.
trans-unit.target: 它可以傳回`null`，這表示，沒有運算式已設定之描述的物件。

trans-unit.source: Expressions are acquired in one of three ways: - The expression could be the result of a prior call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得運算式中有三種:-運算式可能在先前呼叫的結果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The expression could have been found in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>.
trans-unit.target: -此運算式無法中已找到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>

trans-unit.source: - The expression could be derived through <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>.
trans-unit.target: 無法透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>衍生-運算式

trans-unit.source: To derive expressions through <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>, the GetExpression method queries the reference service for a name for the given object.
trans-unit.target: 若要衍生透過運算式<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>，GetExpression 方法查詢參考服務中的指定物件的名稱。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>

trans-unit.source: If the expression service returns a valid name, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>, the GetExpression method checks to see if there is a "." in the name.
trans-unit.target: 如果運算式服務傳回有效的名稱， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>，GetExpression 方法會檢查以查看是否有"。"的名稱。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>

trans-unit.source: This indicates that the expression service found this object as the return value of a read-only property on another object.
trans-unit.target: 這表示運算式服務找到此物件的唯讀屬性的傳回值為另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a ".", GetExpression will split the reference into parts.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有"。"，GetExpression 會分割成組件的參考。

trans-unit.source: The leftmost part is a name that will be evaluated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 最左邊的部分是要評估與名稱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: For each subsequent part, a property reference expression will be built.
trans-unit.target: 對於每個後續的部分，將建置屬性參考運算式。

trans-unit.source: The final expression will then be returned.
trans-unit.target: 最終的運算式，則會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If the object did not have an expression set, or if the object was not found in the reference service, GetExpression will return `null`, indicating there is no existing expression for the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件沒有運算式設定，或如果參考服務中找不到物件，將會傳回 GetExpression `null`，指出物件沒有現有的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.target: 要取得運算式物件。

trans-unit.target: A 代表 value，或 v 沒有現有的運算式是否alue。

trans-unit.source: Locates a serializer for the given object value.
trans-unit.target: 找出給定的物件值的序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The GetSerializer method is an extension to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: GetSerializer 方法是擴充功能<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method takes an object type, rather than an object value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法會採用物件類型，而非物件值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If an external party had overridden metadata for a specific object through <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>, that metadata override would not be seen by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, which only takes a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果外部合作對象已覆寫透過特定物件的中繼資料<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>，該中繼資料覆寫會無法看到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，只接受型別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The GetSerializer method checks the metadata of the value and the value’s type.
trans-unit.target: GetSerializer 方法會檢查中繼資料值和值的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the two differ, GetSerializer will look to see if there is a custom designer serializer attribute on the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個不同，GetSerializer 會尋找以查看是否有自訂設計工具的序列化程式屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If so, GetSerializer will attempt to use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果是這樣，GetSerializer 會嘗試使用它。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will defer to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會由<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: SerializeEvent queries the serialization manager for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> for the given event, and then asks the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> to serialize it.
trans-unit.target: SerializeEvent 查詢的序列化管理員<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer>所指定的事件，並詢問<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer>要序列化該</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer>

trans-unit.target: 如果此服務不存在，將不會寫入事件繫結至未編譯的方法。

trans-unit.source: Event bindings to compiled methods will still be serialized if the objects to which the events are bound can be converted into expressions.

trans-unit.source: The SerializeResource method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource bundle under the given name.
trans-unit.target: SerializeResource 方法是 helper 方法，會將序列化值，以指定的名稱下的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: The culture that the resource is written to is determined by searching the serialization manager’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.Properties%2A> collection for a property called `ResourceCulture`.
trans-unit.target: 寫入資源的文化特性由搜尋序列化管理員的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.Properties%2A>集合中的之屬性呼叫`ResourceCulture`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property exists, resources will be written to that culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性存在，會將資源寫入該文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, resources will be written to the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會將資源寫入文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter must be serializable.
trans-unit.target: `value`參數必須是可序列化。

trans-unit.source: SerializeResource requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> to obtain a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> to write resources for the correct culture.
trans-unit.target: 需要 SerializeResource<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>取得<xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>寫入正確的文化特性的資源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>

trans-unit.source: If this service is not available, SerializeResource will instead build a binary object in code that represents the resource.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服務無法使用，SerializeResource 將改為建立代表資源的程式碼中的二進位物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource bundle into which `value` will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 資源配套，其中名稱`value`會序列化。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into a resource bundle using the given resource name.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化至使用指定的資源名稱的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: The resource is always written to the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 資源就一定會寫入到文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter must be serializable.
trans-unit.target: `value`參數必須是可序列化。

trans-unit.source: The SerializeResourceInvariant method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> to obtain a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> to write resources for the correct culture.
trans-unit.target: SerializeResourceInvariant 方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>取得<xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>寫入正確的文化特性的資源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>

trans-unit.source: If this service is not available, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A> will instead build a binary object in code that represents the resource.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服務無法使用，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A>會改為建立代表資源的程式碼中的二進位物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource bundle into which `value` will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 資源配套，其中名稱`value`會序列化。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into an expression.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化成運算式。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter can be `null`, in which case a primitive expression will be returned.
trans-unit.target: `value`參數可以是`null`，在此情況下會傳回原始的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The SerializeToExpression method uses the following rules for serializing types: 1.
trans-unit.target: SerializeToExpression 方法會序列化型別使用下列規則︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: It first calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method to see if an expression has already been created for the object.
trans-unit.target: 它會先呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>若要查看運算式是否已建立物件的方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: If so, it returns the existing expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，它會傳回現有的運算式。

trans-unit.source: It then locates the object’s serializer, and asks it to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 然後，找出物件的序列化程式，並讓其進行序列化。

trans-unit.source: If the return value of the object’s serializer is a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>, the expression is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件的序列化程式傳回值是<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>，則會傳回運算式。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>

trans-unit.source: It makes one last call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> to see if the serializer added an expression.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫最後一個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>以查看是否序列化程式新增運算式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 最後，它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: If no expression could be created and no suitable serializer could be found, an error will be reported through the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法建立沒有運算式，而且找不到任何適合的序列化程式，則會報告錯誤，透過序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: No error will be reported if a serializer was found but it failed to produce an expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到序列化程式，但它無法產生運算式，將會不報告任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In this case, it is assumed that the serializer either already reported the error or it did not attempt to serialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，它會假設序列化程式已報告錯誤，或是它未嘗試序列化物件。

trans-unit.source: If the serializer returned a statement or a collection of statements, those statements will not be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列化程式傳回的陳述式或陳述式集合，這些陳述式不會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: The SerializeToExpression method will first look for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext> on the context stack and add statements to the statement context object's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext.StatementCollection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SerializeToExpression 方法會先尋找<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext>內容堆疊，並將陳述式加入至陳述式內容物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext.StatementCollection%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext.StatementCollection%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext>

trans-unit.source: If there is no statement context, the SerializeToExpression method will look in the context for a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection> and add the statements there.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有陳述式內容，SerializeToExpression 方法會尋找的內容中<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>然後加入那里的陳述式。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no place can be found to add the statements, an error will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有地方可以找到加入陳述式，將會產生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should not call the SerializeToExpression method within <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService.Serialize%2A> when serializing your own object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您不應該呼叫內的 SerializeToExpression 方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService.Serialize%2A>時將您自己的物件序列化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您應該呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it returns `null`, create your own expression and call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果它傳回`null`、 建立您自己的運算式，並呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then proceed with the rest of your serialization.
trans-unit.target: 然後繼續進行其餘部分的序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A object if value can be serialized; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: A 物件，如果 value 可以序列化，否則 。

trans-unit.source: manager is .
trans-unit.target: manageris .

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into an expression.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化成運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A> method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>方法是 helper 方法，會將值變更為資源運算式序列化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A> method, which writes a value to a resource binary object.
trans-unit.target: 這是相對於<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A>方法，將值寫入資源二進位物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A> goes one step further and returns an expression that can be used to recover the resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>進一步移一個步驟，並傳回可用於復原之資源的運算式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the return value might be "rm.GetValue("SomeBitmap");".
trans-unit.target: 例如，傳回的值可能是 「 rm。GetValue("SomeBitmap");"。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource is calculated from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>, if one can be found on the context stack.
trans-unit.target: 資源的名稱會計算從<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>，如果找到一個內容堆疊上。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A> method will look on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack> for the following objects: - <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>—a collection of statements to add a resource manager to, if one needs to be declared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>方法將會尋找<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>下列物件:- <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>— 陳述式來加入資源管理員，如果您需要將宣告的集合。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>—the root expression, which is needed to create a resource manager.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>— 根運算式，但需要建立資源管理員。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>—used to fabricate a name for the resource and to decide what type of resource manager call to make.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>— 用來製造資源的名稱，以及決定何種類型的資源管理員呼叫，讓。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: A containing value as a serialized expression.
trans-unit.target: A 包含 value 做為序列化的運算式。

trans-unit.source: manager is .
trans-unit.target: manageris .

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into an expression appropriate for the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化至適當的文化特性而異的運算式。

trans-unit.source: If the `ensureInvariant` parameter is `true`, the SerializeToResourceExpression method will also write the resource value into the invariant culture’s resource file if the current `ResourceCulture` is not the invariant culture..
trans-unit.target: 如果`ensureInvariant`參數是`true`，SerializeToResourceExpression 方法將也寫入資源值而異的文化特性資源檔如果目前`ResourceCulture`不是文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to serialize into the invariant culture; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>將序列化為文化特性而異。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A containing value as a serialized expression.
trans-unit.target: A 包含 value 做為序列化的運算式。

trans-unit.target: manageris .

trans-unit.source: Associates an object with an expression.
trans-unit.target: 將物件關聯的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The SetExpression method is a helper method that associates a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> with an object.
trans-unit.target: SetExpression 方法是 helper 方法相關聯的<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>的物件。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>

trans-unit.source: Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 與這種方式中的運算式相關聯的物件都是可透過存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: SetExpression stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: SetExpression 會儲存其運算式資料表做為附加的物件內容堆疊上的任何序列化程式的存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>供序列化使用。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> with which to associate `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>與相關聯`value`。

trans-unit.source: Associates an object with an expression, optionally specifying a preset expression.
trans-unit.target: 將物件關聯的運算式，並選擇性地指定預設的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The SetExpression method is a helper method that associates a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> with an object.
trans-unit.target: SetExpression 方法是 helper 方法相關聯的<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>的物件。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>

trans-unit.source: Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 與這種方式中的運算式相關聯的物件都是可透過存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SetExpression stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: SetExpression 會儲存其運算式資料表做為附加的物件內容堆疊上的任何序列化程式的存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>
